name: protoc-gen-ts
description: Compile protocol buffers descriptors to Typescript.

scripts.test: bazel build //test:codegen //test:codegen_experimental //test/conformance:codegen && node ./scripts/sync_generated_protos.js test && bazel test //test/... --test_output=errors
scripts.codegen: node ./scripts/sync_compiler_protos.js && bazel build //src:codegen && node ./scripts/sync_generated_protos.js src/compiler && bazel build //src:compiler && node ./scripts/sync_generated_protos.js src/compiler js
